step_id.description: The sequential ID of the verification step.

intent.description: A clear description of what this step is trying to verify (e.g., 'Check for null pointer in user_auth.py').

files.description: List of source or test files involved in this step.

tools.description: The specific toolset required for this step.

expected_signal.description: The specific string or regex pattern the Verifier should look for in the tool output to confirm success.
